data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the genus Xenogryllus Bolívar, 1890 (Orthoptera, Gryllidae, Eneopterinae, Xenogryllini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jaiswara, Ranjana, Dong, Jiajia, Ma, Libin, Yin, Haisheng, Robillard, Tony (2019): Taxonomic revision of the genus Xenogryllus Bolívar, 1890 (Orthoptera, Gryllidae, Eneopterinae, Xenogryllini). Zootaxa 4545 (3): 301-338, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4545.3.1
